mapper.select: select job "job", company "company", location "location", salary "salary", salary_start "salaryStart", salary_end "salaryEnd", create_date "createDate", url "url", detail "detail" from app_job_t limit 1,100
mapper.insert:
insert into app_job_t( job, company, location, salary, salary_start, salary_end, create_date, url, detail) values
(#{item.job}, #{item.company}, #{item.location}, #{item.salary}, #{item.salaryStart}, #{item.salaryEnd}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.url}, #{item.detail} )
